modName: SOS - Revealing Armors for Schlongs of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/wm2uqdwgutj2tsl/nexuspattern.png?token_hash=AAEJqVlAw_NtCpwzLjPXLAi9BEBXjrHvtoU8jOL_n2gDIw[/IMG]
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/8812ztodp116q0a/SOSLogo02.png?token_hash=AAHYYrNtb4jtN6UbNpKkiLA1BY3fvrHFMNTB-YQMEpFivA[/IMG][/center]
These armors will act as replacers, but they also need an ESP in order to better work with SOS. They are being developed at the same time for both Default and Bodybuilder shapes, menaing that even if the images just depict a specific body shape, there will always be the the default and Bodybuilder options.

[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/6opsxigt4cd0x3i/sosspace.png?token_hash=AAFZP1x5UGhTzOhnD0Km_zSDvUUJ6aSCU9naJOvdmFxtzg[/img][/center]


[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35463]SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5033997]VectorPlexus[/url] & [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3078999]Smurf[/url] 


[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/6opsxigt4cd0x3i/sosspace.png?token_hash=AAFZP1x5UGhTzOhnD0Km_zSDvUUJ6aSCU9naJOvdmFxtzg[/img][/center]


[b]INSTALLATION AND LOAD ORDER[/b]

The Revealing ESP must be loaded AFTER Schlongs of Skyrim.esp


[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/6opsxigt4cd0x3i/sosspace.png?token_hash=AAFZP1x5UGhTzOhnD0Km_zSDvUUJ6aSCU9naJOvdmFxtzg[/img][/center]


[b]BUGS AND ISSUES[/b]

We know that some of the armor/clothings have still some clipping issues, but our primary goal will be to refit all armors (or at least try to) to both Bodyshapes available in SOS. After that we will then start to tweak and fix any problems.

You can however help us by reporting issues. When doing so:
- Tell us what body shape are you using (Default or Bodybuilder) 
- Tell us what is the character\'s weight (0 to 100)
- What Action/Animation can it be seen and in what zone of the body
- Provide a printscreen (with a clear view of the issue)
author: aoki and VectorPlexus

files.name: SOS - Revealing Armors - BodyBuilder Body
files.changelogHtml:
Armors: Bandit, Blades, Daedric, Dragonbone, Dragonscale, Dwarven, Ebony, Ebony Mail, Elven, Glass, Iron, Sons of Talos
Clothing: Archmage, Mageapprentice, Magejourneyman, Monk, Necromancer, Prisoner, Warlock
